articles.title: Ronaldo, Rooney and now Bruno: Three beautiful United goals compared - The Athletic
articles.description: Bruno Fernandes' goal against Brighton was reminiscent of classic Rooney and Ronaldo strikes for Manchester United
articles.content: As Manchester United carried the ball up Brighton & Hove Albion’s pitch with the speed of the Royal Air Force and the poise of the Royal Ballet, it was an instinctive urge to think back to two go… [+740 chars]
